Description: The following statement contains a magic number: gradient = VesselViewer.genColorGradient(256);

The following statement contains a magic number: if (data.strobe)               {                  float red = data.rand.Next(256) / 256f;                  float grn = data.rand.Next(256) / 256f;                  float blu = data.rand.Next(256) / 256f;                  Color newColor = new Color(red' grn' blu);                  return newColor;              }              else               {                  int time = Time.frameCount % 512;                  if (time >= 256) time = 511 - time;                  return gradient[time];              }
